title: How to run your car on vegetable oil
content:
Can’t afford an EV? Not willing to give up on a classic car? Want to eschew rising fuel prices? There are lots of good reasons to increase your car’s fuel economy. But one thing you might want to consider is running your car on vegetable oil. I took a deep dive, and I’m sharing all I learned with you about making the switch. Not all cars are equal Firstly, not all cars can run on straight vegetable oil. Older crappier diesel engine cars are most suitable to run on cooking oil. Petrol-powered cars have a different form of combustion and…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Want to save money and help the environment? Here's what you need to know about running a car on vegetable oil.
